metadata.name: Garden Under Moonlight
metadata.description:
Digital Drawing by Mad Cherry, June 2023
2000x2000px, 300dpi

Casting spells under a moonlit sky, a young wizard discovers a forgotten, overgrown garden teeming with mystical creatures.
Prompt by Jack Bliss (Twitter: ovation_network)

A young magician casts a spell under the moon. His magic brings clouds into the sky, and trees start to come upside down from the sky. A garden inhabited by various creatures emerges as the trees touch the ground. Animals appear from here and there, fairies gather around the fountain, and flowers bloom on the trees and ground.

The prompt was chosen for the mood of the night garden and the theme involving "mystical creatures." AI was not used in the process. The rough sketch was done on paper; the rest of the artwork was done in photoshop.
